com.monochromeroad.grails.plugins.xwiki
[Java] Class XWikiStreamRenderer

java.lang.Object
  com.monochromeroad.grails.plugins.xwiki.XWikiRenderingSystem
      com.monochromeroad.grails.plugins.xwiki.XWikiStreamRenderer

public class XWikiStreamRenderer
extends XWikiRenderingSystem

XWiki Rendering System -- streaming based

If you use some macros or transformations, it needs to create a XDOM that represents the whole document structure in a memory.

Default Syntax
xwiki/2.1
Output
xhtml/1.0
Authors:
Masatoshi Hayashi

Field Summary

For the Grails Default XWiki Rendering System.
